target_audience: Active adults aged 18-45, fitness enthusiasts, amateur and professional athletes seeking high-performance sports gear

message.en-US: Unleash Your Power This Spring - Performance Gear for Champions
message.en-CA: Unlock Your Potential - Elite Performance for Every Athlete
message.es-MX: Libera Tu Poder Esta Primavera - Equipo de Alto Rendimiento

products.name: Bolt Runner Pro - Performance Running Shoes
products.prompt: high-performance running shoes in black and electric blue, dynamic action shot on track, professional sports photography, carbon fiber plate visible, Winners lightning bolt logo on side, athletic and powerful aesthetic, studio lighting with motion blur effect
products.negative_prompt: casual sneakers, worn shoes, plain background, static pose, low quality, blurry details, amateur photography
products.image_path: placeholder - will be set during upload

products.name: Lightning Compression Athletic Wear
products.prompt: black compression athletic shirt with electric blue lightning bolt accents, form-fitting performance fabric, athlete wearing during intense workout, gym environment, moisture-wicking material visible, Winners logo prominent on chest, dynamic fitness photography
products.negative_prompt: baggy clothing, cotton t-shirt, casual wear, poor fit, washed out colors, static mannequin
products.image_path: placeholder - will be set during upload

products.name: Power Training Performance Bag
products.prompt: sleek black and blue sports duffel bag, premium materials, Winners lightning bolt logo embossed, athletic training equipment partially visible inside, professional product photography, gym or locker room setting, high-end sports gear aesthetic
products.negative_prompt: cheap backpack, worn material, cluttered background, poor lighting, generic design
products.image_path: placeholder - will be set during upload
